snippet.title: Warriors: Rise to Glory! | PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
Warriors: Rise to Glory! on Steam | PC HD Indie Gameplay

Game Description: Warriors: Rise to Glory! is a turn-based combat game with RPG elements. You are a fierce warrior in your path to glory. Fight epic battles against many different enemies and gain experience and loot to improve your skills, weapons, and armor to find revenge and freedom!

Created by: Gavra Games

Price: $9.99

Download link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/582330/Warriors_Rise_to_Glory/

Make sure you Like, Comment, Subscribe and Share!

Want more Splazer?

Follow us: http://Twitter.com/Splazer
Like us at: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Splazer-Productions/186784821402916
Email: Team@Splazer.com
